feed.title: Google Cloud: App Engine flexible environment Java
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: App Engine flexible environment Java

entry.summary: The Java 25 runtime is now available in preview for App Engine flexible environment. This update provides access to the latest Java features and improvements.
entry.title: Feature: Java 25 Runtime Now in Preview

entry.content: To increase security, starting in March 2025, support for Transport Layer Security (TLS) version 1.1 and earlier is deprecated. Update your application settings in the App Engine flexible environment to use TLS version 1.2 and later, along with a corresponding secure set of cipher suites (Preview).
entry.summary: Starting March 2025, TLS 1.1 and earlier are deprecated. Update your App Engine settings to use TLS 1.2 or later.
entry.title: Feature: TLS Deprecation Update
